name: Jigoku Sensei Nube
overview: This Playstation game published by Bandai is based on an anime series of the same title: Nube is a clumsy, easygoing, and very kind teacher, but he has a secret under his glove on the left hand. He has a monster hand, and he also has the ability to sense ghosts and evil spirits. So he protects his dear students from these evil spirits with his monster hand, proving to be very powerful. In the game the player controls one of Nube's students in a first person perspective adventure in which the player will have to make choices and those choices will change the afinity with the other students.
